text: Air Vice Marshal Michael Guy Lloyd, was a senior commander in the Royal Air Force who served as the Air Officer Commanding No. 22 Group from 2011 until 2014. ==RAF career== Lloyd served with No. 18 Squadron from 1981 to 1985.18 Squadron Association Newsletter Promoted to air commodore in 2004, Lloyd became Director of Defence Publicity in 2004,Media Leaks Prompt MoD Comms Revamp PR Week, 17 September 2004 Director of Reserve Forces and Cadets in 2006,Appointments List 07/06 and Director of Corporate Affairs in 2008RAF Rugby Union before becoming Air Secretary in March 2009.Senior Royal Air Force Appointments In 2011, he became the Air Officer Commanding No. 22 Group.RAF Shawbury Formal Inspection Shropshire Live, 1 July 2012 ==Honours == He was appointed Companion of the Order of the Bath (CB) in the 2013 Birthday Honours. ==References== |- Category:Companions of the Order of the Bath Category:Living people Category:Royal Air Force air marshals Category:Royal Air Force personnel of the Falklands War Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
